version_description:
Introducing Linnk International! Now you can select from two servers when signing up.
Linnk International: linnk.cc
Linnk China: linnk.net

- Bug fixes and  improvements
- Numerous fixes for iOS 11

Introducing Linnk International! Now you can select from two servers when signing up.
Linnk International: linnk.cc
Linnk China: linnk.net

- Bug fixes and  improvements
- Numerous fixes for iOS 11

- iPhone X layout bug fix
- Other bug fix

Linnk 2.0 brings you the amazing Smart Folder feature.
Organize all bookmarks with your customized rules automatically, keep everything clean just like magic.
We also simplified the archive process, now you can tap the archive button on the bookmark menu or the reader view, archive bookmarks or folders with a single tap.
We also fixed a lot of bugs. 

Linnk Support: support@linnk.net

- iPhone X batch operation layout bug fix
- iPad bug fix

Recent Update:
- Smart Folders
- Archive
- New Premium Plan

New: Support Spotlight Search.
Fixed web browsing layout issue on iPhone X.
Fixed some critical bugs.

- Ready for iOS 12 & New iPhone Devices
- Bug fix

- Layout fix for new generation of iPad devices.
- Other improvements.

- iOS 13 dark mode support
- UI layout issue fix
- Share extension bug fix
- App Store link crash issue fix
- Other UI improvements and fixes

• Home split view on iPad.
• Improved guidance, login, and signup.
• Tag edit bug fix.
• Inbox bookmark quantity on widget bug fix.
• iPad logout bug fix.
• Other bug fixes and improvements.

Linnk 4.0 is on the way, stay tuned.

Welcome to the brand new Cubox 4.0!

This new version brings a redesigned appearance, a more intuitive and efficient experience, improved iPad and Mac compatibility, and more than 10 feature updates.

- App renamed.
- App icon redesigned.
- Mac support!
- Article View is back!
- Sign in with Apple support.
- Upgraded Smart Folders, support more keywords and filter options.
- Adjustable article reading styles.
- Save to Cubox quick extension.
- Bookmark cover-image preview.
- Upgraded tags.
- Better iPad support.
- Batch operation optimization.
- Spotlight keyword options.
- Statistics
- Dark/Light mode.
- Shortcut keys and URL Schemes.
